rows.arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
rows.translation: The revelation of this Book is from Allah, the Exalted in Power, full of Wisdom.
rows.transliteration: tanzīlul kitābi minallāhil `azīzil ḥakīm

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.

rows.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَٱعْبُدِ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
rows.translation: Verily it is We Who have revealed the Book to thee in Truth: so serve Allah, offering Him sincere devotion.
rows.transliteration: innā anzalnā ilaykal kitāba bil ḥaqqi fa`budillāha mukhliṣal lahud dīn

rows.arabic: أَلَا لِلَّهِ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلْخَالِصُ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ مَا نَعْبُدُهُمْ إِلَّا لِيُقَرِّبُونَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ زُلْفَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ فِى مَا هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى مَنْ هُوَ كَـٰذِبٌ كَفَّارٌ
rows.translation: Is it not to Allah that sincere devotion is due? But those who take for protectors other than Allah (say): "We only serve them in order that they may bring us nearer to Allah." Truly Allah will judge between them in that wherein they differ. But Allah guides not such as are false and ungrateful.
rows.transliteration: alā lillāhid dīnul khāliṣ ۚ wal ladhīnat-takhadhū min dūnihi awliyā-a mā na`buduhum illā liyuqarribūnā ilallāhi zulfā innallāha yaḥkumu baynahum fī mā hum fīhi yakhtalifūn ۗ innallāha lā yahdī man huwa kādhibun kaffār

rows.arabic: لَّوْ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا لَّٱصْطَفَىٰ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ ۖ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ
rows.translation: Had Allah wished to take to Himself a son, He could have chosen whom He pleased out of those whom He doth create: but Glory be to Him! (He is above such things.) He is Allah, the One, the Irresistible.
rows.transliteration: law arādallāhu an yattakhidha waladal laṣṭafā mimmā yakhluqu mā yashā-u ۚ subḥānah ۖ huwallāhul wāḥidul qahhār

rows.arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ يُكَوِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ عَلَى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُكَوِّرُ ٱلنَّهَارَ عَلَى ٱلَّيْلِ ۖ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّ يَجْرِى لِأَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۗ أَلَا هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّـٰرُ
rows.translation: He created the heavens and the earth in true (proportions): He makes the Night overlap the Day, and the Day overlap the Night: He has subjected the sun and the moon (to His law): Each one follows a course for a time appointed. Is not He the Exalted in Power - He Who forgives again and again?
rows.transliteration: khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa bil ḥaqq ۖ yukawwirul layla `alan nahāri wayukawwirun nahāra `alal layl ۖ wasakhharash shamsa wal qamar ۖ kullun yajrī li-ajalin musammā ۗ alā huwal `azīzul ghaffār

rows.arabic: خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍ وَٰحِدَةٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ ثَمَـٰنِيَةَ أَزْوَٰجٍ ۚ يَخْلُقُكُمْ فِى بُطُونِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ خَلْقًا مِّنۢ بَعْدِ خَلْقٍ فِى ظُلُمَـٰتٍ ثَلَـٰثٍ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصْرَفُونَ
rows.translation: He created you (all) from a single person: then created, of like nature, his mate; and he sent down for you eight head of cattle in pairs: He makes you, in the wombs of your mothers, in stages, one after another, in three veils of darkness. such is Allah, your Lord and Cherisher: to Him belongs (all) dominion. There is no god but He: then how are ye turned away (from your true Centre)?
rows.transliteration: khalaqakum min nafsin wāḥidatin thumma ja`ala minhā zawjahā wa-anzala lakum minal-an`āmi thamāniyata azwāj ۚ yakhluqukum fī buṭūni ummahātikum khalqan min ba`di khalqin fī ẓulumātin thalāth ۚ dhālikumullāhu rabbukum lahul mulk ۖ lā ilāha illā huw ۖ fa-annā tuṣrafūn

rows.arabic: إِن تَكْفُرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِىٌّ عَنكُمْ ۖ وَلَا يَرْضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ ٱلْكُفْرَ ۖ وَإِن تَشْكُرُوا۟ يَرْضَهُ لَكُمْ ۗ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۗ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُم مَّرْجِعُكُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
rows.translation: If ye reject (Allah), Truly Allah hath no need of you; but He liketh not ingratitude from His servants: if ye are grateful, He is pleased with you. No bearer of burdens can bear the burden of another. In the end, to your Lord is your Return, when He will tell you the truth of all that ye did (in this life). for He knoweth well all that is in (men's) hearts.
rows.transliteration: in takfurū fa-innallāha ghaniyyun `ankum ۖ walā yarḍā li`ibādihil kufr ۖ wa in tashkurū yarḍahu lakum ۗ walā taziru wāziratun wizra ukhrā ۗ thumma ilā rabbikum marji`ukum fayunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum ta`malūn ۚ innahu `alīmun bidhātiṣ ṣudūr

rows.arabic: وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ ضُرٌّ دَعَا رَبَّهُۥ مُنِيبًا إِلَيْهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُۥ نِعْمَةً مِّنْهُ نَسِىَ مَا كَانَ يَدْعُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ مِن قَبْلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَندَادًا لِّيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ ۚ قُلْ تَمَتَّعْ بِكُفْرِكَ قَلِيلًا ۖ إِنَّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ
rows.translation: When some trouble toucheth man, he crieth unto his Lord, turning to Him in repentance: but when He bestoweth a favour upon him as from Himself, (man) doth forget what he cried and prayed for before, and he doth set up rivals unto Allah, thus misleading others from Allah's Path. Say, "Enjoy thy blasphemy for a little while: verily thou art (one) of the Companions of the Fire!"
rows.transliteration: wa idhā massal-insāna ḍurrun da`ā rabbahu munīban ilayhi thumma idhā khawwalahu ni`matan minhu nasiya mā kāna yad`ū ilayhi min qablu waja`ala lillāhi andādal liyuḍilla `an sabīlih ۚ qul tamatta` bikufrika qalīlā ۖ innaka min aṣ-ḥābin nār

rows.arabic: أَمَّنْ هُوَ قَـٰنِتٌ ءَانَآءَ ٱلَّيْلِ سَاجِدًا وَقَآئِمًا يَحْذَرُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ وَيَرْجُوا۟ رَحْمَةَ رَبِّهِۦ ۗ قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِى ٱلَّذِينَ يَعْلَمُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
rows.translation: Is one who worships devoutly during the hour of the night prostrating himself or standing (in adoration), who takes heed of the Hereafter, and who places his hope in the Mercy of his Lord - (like one who does not)? Say: "Are those equal, those who know and those who do not know? It is those who are endued with understanding that receive admonition.
rows.transliteration: amman huwa qānitun ānā-al layli sājidan waqā-iman yaḥdharul-ākhirata wayarjū raḥmata rabbih ۗ qul hal yastawil ladhīna ya`lamūna wal ladhīna lā ya`lamūn ۗ innamā yatadhakkaru ulul-albāb

rows.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰعِبَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةٌ ۗ وَأَرْضُ ٱللَّهِ وَٰسِعَةٌ ۗ إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
rows.translation: Say: "O ye my servants who believe! Fear your Lord, good is (the reward) for those who do good in this world. Spacious is Allah's earth! those who patiently persevere will truly receive a reward without measure!"
rows.transliteration: qul yā`ibādil ladhīna āmanut-taqū rabbakum ۚ lilladhīna aḥsanū fī hādhihid dunyā ḥasanah ۗ wa-arḍullāhi wāsi`ah ۗ innamā yuwaffaṣ ṣābirūna ajrahum bighayri ḥisāb

rows.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
rows.translation: Say: "Verily, I am commanded to serve Allah with sincere devotion;
rows.transliteration: qul innī umirtu an a`budallāha mukhliṣal lahud dīn

rows.arabic: وَأُمِرْتُ لِأَنْ أَكُونَ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
rows.translation: "And I am commanded to be the first of those who bow to Allah in Islam."
rows.transliteration: wa-umirtu li-an akūna awwalal-muslimīn

rows.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ إِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّى عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
rows.translation: Say: "I would, if I disobeyed my Lord, indeed have fear of the Penalty of a Mighty Day."
rows.transliteration: qul innī akhāfu in `aṣaytu rabbī `adhāba yawmin `aẓīm

rows.arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعْبُدُ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُۥ دِينِى
rows.translation: Say: "It is Allah I serve, with my sincere (and exclusive) devotion:
rows.transliteration: qulillāha a`budu mukhliṣal lahu dīnī

rows.arabic: فَٱعْبُدُوا۟ مَا شِئْتُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَأَهْلِيهِمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۗ أَلَا ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْخُسْرَانُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
rows.translation: "Serve ye what ye will besides him." Say: "Truly, those in loss are those who lose their own souls and their People on the Day of Judgment: Ah! that is indeed the (real and) evident Loss!
rows.transliteration: fa`budū mā shi-tum min dūnih ۗ qul innal khāsirīnal ladhīna khasirū anfusahum wa-ahlīhim yawmal qiyāmah ۗ alā dhālika huwal khusrānul mubīn

rows.arabic: لَهُم مِّن فَوْقِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمِن تَحْتِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يُخَوِّفُ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ عِبَادَهُۥ ۚ يَـٰعِبَادِ فَٱتَّقُونِ
rows.translation: They shall have Layers of Fire above them, and Layers (of Fire) below them: with this doth Allah warn off his servants: "O My Servants! then fear ye Me!"
rows.transliteration: lahum min fawqihim ẓulalun minan nāri wa min taḥtihim ẓulal ۚ dhālika yukhawwifullāhu bihi `ibādah ۚ yā`ibādi fattaqūn

rows.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱجْتَنَبُوا۟ ٱلطَّـٰغُوتَ أَن يَعْبُدُوهَا وَأَنَابُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ لَهُمُ ٱلْبُشْرَىٰ ۚ فَبَشِّرْ عِبَادِ
rows.translation: Those who eschew Evil,- and fall not into its worship,- and turn to Allah (in repentance),- for them is Good News: so announce the Good News to My Servants,-
rows.transliteration: wal ladhīnaj-tanabuṭ ṭāghūta an ya`budūhā wa-anābū ilallāhi lahumul bushrā ۚ fabashhir `ibād

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَمِعُونَ ٱلْقَوْلَ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ أَحْسَنَهُۥٓ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
rows.translation: Those who listen to the Word, and follow the best (meaning) in it: those are the ones whom Allah has guided, and those are the ones endued with understanding.
rows.transliteration: alladhīna yastami`ūnal qawla fayattabi`ūna aḥsanah ۚ ulā-ikal ladhīna hadāhumullāh ۖ wa-ulā-ika hum ulul-albāb

rows.arabic: أَفَمَنْ حَقَّ عَلَيْهِ كَلِمَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِى ٱلنَّارِ
rows.translation: Is, then, one against whom the decree of Punishment is justly due (equal to one who eschews Evil)? Wouldst thou, then, deliver one (who is) in the Fire?
rows.transliteration: afaman ḥaqqa `alayhi kalimatul `adhābi afa-anta tunqidhu man fin nār

rows.arabic: لَـٰكِنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ رَبَّهُمْ لَهُمْ غُرَفٌ مِّن فَوْقِهَا غُرَفٌ مَّبْنِيَّةٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۖ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ لَا يُخْلِفُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمِيعَادَ
rows.translation: But it is for those who fear their Lord. That lofty mansions, one above another, have been built: beneath them flow rivers (of delight): (such is) the Promise of Allah: never doth Allah fail in (His) promise.
rows.transliteration: lākinil ladhīnat-taqaw rabbahum lahum ghurafun min fawqihā ghurafun mabniyyatun tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār ۖ wa`dallāh ۖ lā yukhlifullāhul mī`ād

rows.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَسَلَكَهُۥ يَنَـٰبِيعَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ثُمَّ يُخْرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرْعًا مُّخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَٰنُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصْفَرًّا ثُمَّ يَجْعَلُهُۥ حُطَـٰمًا ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
rows.translation: Seest thou not that Allah sends down rain from the sky, and leads it through springs in the earth? Then He causes to grow, therewith, produce of various colours: then it withers; thou wilt see it grow yellow; then He makes it dry up and crumble away. Truly, in this, is a Message of remembrance to men of understanding.
rows.transliteration: alam tara annallāha anzala minas samā-i mā-an fasalakahu yanābī`a fil-arḍi thumma yukhriju bihi zar`an mukhtalifan alwānuhu thumma yahīju fatarāhu muṣfarran thumma yaj`aluhu ḥuṭāmā ۚ inna fī dhālika ladhikrā li-ulil-albāb

rows.arabic: أَفَمَن شَرَحَ ٱللَّهُ صَدْرَهُۥ لِلْإِسْلَـٰمِ فَهُوَ عَلَىٰ نُورٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْقَـٰسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُم مِّن ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
rows.translation: Is one whose heart Allah has opened to Islam, so that he has received Enlightenment from Allah, (no better than one hard-hearted)? Woe to those whose hearts are hardened against celebrating the praises of Allah! they are manifestly wandering (in error)!
rows.transliteration: afaman sharaḥallāhu ṣadrahu lilislāmi fahuwa `alā nūrin min rabbih ۚ fawaylul lilqāsiyati qulūbuhum min dhikrillāh ۚ ulā-ika fī ḍalālin mubīn

rows.arabic: ٱللَّهُ نَزَّلَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْحَدِيثِ كِتَـٰبًا مُّتَشَـٰبِهًا مَّثَانِىَ تَقْشَعِرُّ مِنْهُ جُلُودُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُمْ ثُمَّ تَلِينُ جُلُودُهُمْ وَقُلُوبُهُمْ إِلَىٰ ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهْدِى بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍ
rows.translation: Allah has revealed (from time to time) the most beautiful Message in the form of a Book, consistent with itself, (yet) repeating (its teaching in various aspects): the skins of those who fear their Lord tremble thereat; then their skins and their hearts do soften to the celebration of Allah's praises. Such is the guidance of Allah: He guides therewith whom He pleases, but such as Allah leaves to stray, can have none to guide.
rows.transliteration: allāhu nazzala aḥsanal ḥadīthi kitāban mutashābihan mathāniya taqsha`irru minhu julūdul ladhīna yakhshawna rabbahum thumma talīnu julūduhum waqulūbuhum ilā dhikrillāh ۚ dhālika hudallāhi yahdī bihi man yashā-u ۚ wa man yuḍlilillāhu famā lahu min hād

rows.arabic: أَفَمَن يَتَّقِى بِوَجْهِهِۦ سُوٓءَ ٱلْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ وَقِيلَ لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ ذُوقُوا۟ مَا كُنتُمْ تَكْسِبُونَ
rows.translation: Is, then, one who has to fear the brunt of the Penalty on the Day of Judgment (and receive it) on his face, (like one guarded therefrom)? It will be said to the wrong-doers: "Taste ye (the fruits of) what ye earned!"
rows.transliteration: afaman yattaqī biwajhihi sū al `adhābi yawmal qiyāmah ۚ waqīla liẓẓālimīna dhūqū mā kuntum taksibūn

rows.arabic: كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
rows.translation: Those before them (also) rejected (revelation), and so the Punishment came to them from directions they did not perceive.
rows.transliteration: kadhhabal ladhīna min qablihim fa-atāhumul `adhābu min ḥaythu lā yash`urūn

rows.arabic: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْخِزْىَ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: So Allah gave them a taste of humiliation in the present life, but greater is the punishment of the Hereafter, if they only knew!
rows.transliteration: fa-adhāqahumullāhul khizya fil ḥayātid dunyā ۖ wala`adhābul-ākhirati akbar ۚ law kānū ya`lamūn

rows.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ضَرَبْنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِى هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٍ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
rows.translation: We have put forth for men, in this Qur'an every kind of Parable, in order that they may receive admonition.
rows.transliteration: walaqad ḍarabnā linnāsi fī hādhal qur-āni min kulli mathalin la`allahum yatadhakkarūn

rows.arabic: قُرْءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيْرَ ذِى عِوَجٍ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ
rows.translation: (It is) a Qur'an in Arabic, without any crookedness (therein): in order that they may guard against Evil.
rows.transliteration: qur-ānan `arabiyyan ghayra dhī `iwajin la`allahum yattaqūn

rows.arabic: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلًا رَّجُلًا فِيهِ شُرَكَآءُ مُتَشَـٰكِسُونَ وَرَجُلًا سَلَمًا لِّرَجُلٍ هَلْ يَسْتَوِيَانِ مَثَلًا ۚ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: Allah puts forth a Parable a man belonging to many partners at variance with each other, and a man belonging entirely to one master: are those two equal in comparison? Praise be to Allah! but most of them have no knowledge.
rows.transliteration: ḍaraballāhu mathalan rajulan fīhi shurakā-u mutashākisūna warajulan salamal lirajulin hal yastawiyāni mathalā ۚ al-ḥamdu lillāh ۚ bal aktharuhum lā ya`lamūn

rows.arabic: إِنَّكَ مَيِّتٌ وَإِنَّهُم مَّيِّتُونَ
rows.translation: Truly thou wilt die (one day), and truly they (too) will die (one day).
rows.transliteration: innaka mayyitun wa innahum mayyitūn

rows.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمْ تَخْتَصِمُونَ
rows.translation: In the end will ye (all), on the Day of Judgment, settle your disputes in the presence of your Lord.
rows.transliteration: thumma innakum yawmal qiyāmati `inda rabbikum takhtaṣimūn

rows.arabic: فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّن كَذَبَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ إِذْ جَآءَهُۥٓ ۚ أَلَيْسَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًى لِّلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
rows.translation: Who, then, doth more wrong than one who utters a lie concerning Allah, and rejects the Truth when it comes to him; is there not in Hell an abode for blasphemers?
rows.transliteration: faman aẓlamu mimman kadhaba `alallāhi wakadhhaba biṣ ṣidqi idh jā-ah ۚ alaysa fī jahannama mathwan lilkāfirīn

rows.arabic: وَٱلَّذِى جَآءَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦٓ ۙ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ
rows.translation: And he who brings the Truth and he who confirms (and supports) it - such are the men who do right.
rows.transliteration: wal ladhī jā-a biṣ ṣidqi waṣaddaqa bihi ulā-ika humul muttaqūn

rows.arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
rows.translation: They shall have all that they wish for, in the presence of their Lord: such is the reward of those who do good:
rows.transliteration: lahum mā yashā-ūna `inda rabbihim ۚ dhālika jazā-ul muḥsinīn

rows.arabic: لِيُكَفِّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ أَسْوَأَ ٱلَّذِى عَمِلُوا۟ وَيَجْزِيَهُمْ أَجْرَهُم بِأَحْسَنِ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
rows.translation: So that Allah will turn off from them (even) the worst in their deeds and give them their reward according to the best of what they have done.
rows.transliteration: liyukaffirallāhu `anhum aswa-al ladhī `amilū wayajziyahum ajrahum bi-aḥsanil ladhī kānū ya`malūn

rows.arabic: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِكَافٍ عَبْدَهُۥ ۖ وَيُخَوِّفُونَكَ بِٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍ
rows.translation: Is not Allah enough for his Servant? But they try to frighten thee with other (gods) besides Him! for such as Allah leaves to stray, there can be no guide.
rows.transliteration: alaysallāhu bikāfin `abdah ۖ wayukhawwifūnaka bil ladhīna min dūnih ۚ wa man yuḍlilillāhu famā lahu min hād

rows.arabic: وَمَن يَهْدِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّضِلٍّ ۗ أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِعَزِيزٍ ذِى ٱنتِقَامٍ
rows.translation: And such as Allah doth guide there can be none to lead astray. Is not Allah Exalted in Power, (Able to enforce His Will), Lord of Retribution?
rows.transliteration: wa man yahdillāhu famā lahu min muḍill ۗ alaysallāhu bi`azīzin dhin-tiqām

rows.arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُ ۚ قُلْ أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِنْ أَرَادَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ هَلْ هُنَّ كَـٰشِفَـٰتُ ضُرِّهِۦٓ أَوْ أَرَادَنِى بِرَحْمَةٍ هَلْ هُنَّ مُمْسِكَـٰتُ رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ قُلْ حَسْبِىَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ عَلَيْهِ يَتَوَكَّلُ ٱلْمُتَوَكِّلُونَ
rows.translation: If indeed thou ask them who it is that created the heavens and the earth, they would be sure to say, "Allah". Say: "See ye then? the things that ye invoke besides Allah,- can they, if Allah wills some Penalty for me, remove His Penalty?- Or if He wills some Grace for me, can they keep back his Grace?" Say: "Sufficient is Allah for me! In Him trust those who put their trust."
rows.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa layaqūlunnallāh ۚ qul afara aytum mā tad`ūna min dūnillāhi in arādaniyallāhu biḍurrin hal hunna kāshifātu ḍurrihi aw arādanī biraḥmatin hal hunna mumsikātu raḥmatih ۚ qul ḥasbiyallāh ۖ `alayhi yatawakkalul mutawakkilūn

rows.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِنِّى عَـٰمِلٌ ۖ فَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: Say: "O my People! Do whatever ye can: I will do (my part): but soon will ye know-
rows.transliteration: qul yāqawmi'-malū `alā makānatikum innī `āmil ۖ fasawfa ta`lamūn

rows.arabic: مَن يَأْتِيهِ عَذَابٌ يُخْزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيْهِ عَذَابٌ مُّقِيمٌ
rows.translation: "Who it is to whom comes a Penalty of ignominy, and on whom descends a Penalty that abides."
rows.transliteration: man ya-tīhi `adhābun yukhzīhi wayaḥillu `alayhi `adhābun muqīm

rows.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ لِلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ فَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ فَلِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَإِنَّمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيْهَا ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِوَكِيلٍ
rows.translation: Verily We have revealed the Book to thee in Truth, for (instructing) mankind. He, then, that receives guidance benefits his own soul: but he that strays injures his own soul. Nor art thou set over them to dispose of their affairs.
rows.transliteration: innā anzalnā `alaykal kitāba linnāsi bil ḥaqq ۖ famanih-tadā falinafsih ۖ wa man ḍalla fa-innamā yaḍillu `alayhā ۖ wa mā anta `alayhim biwakīl

rows.arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَتَوَفَّى ٱلْأَنفُسَ حِينَ مَوْتِهَا وَٱلَّتِى لَمْ تَمُتْ فِى مَنَامِهَا ۖ فَيُمْسِكُ ٱلَّتِى قَضَىٰ عَلَيْهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ وَيُرْسِلُ ٱلْأُخْرَىٰٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
rows.translation: It is Allah that takes the souls (of men) at death; and those that die not (He takes) during their sleep: those on whom He has passed the decree of death, He keeps back (from returning to life), but the rest He sends (to their bodies) for a term appointed verily in this are Signs for those who reflect.
rows.transliteration: allāhu yatawaffal-anfusa ḥīna mawtihā wal latī lam tamut fī manāmihā ۖ fayumsikul latī qaḍā `alayhal mawta wayursilul-ukhrā ilā ajalin musammā ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin liqawmiy yatafakkarūn

rows.arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُفَعَآءَ ۚ قُلْ أَوَلَوْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
rows.translation: What! Do they take for intercessors others besides Allah? Say: "Even if they have no power whatever and no intelligence?"
rows.transliteration: amit-takhadhū min dūnillāhi shufa`ā-a ۚ qul awalaw kānū lā yamlikūna shay-an walā ya`qilūn

rows.arabic: قُل لِّلَّهِ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةُ جَمِيعًا ۖ لَّهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
rows.translation: Say: "To Allah belongs exclusively (the right to grant) intercession: to Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth: In the End, it is to Him that ye shall be brought back."
rows.transliteration: qul lillāhish shafā`atu jamī`ā ۖ lahu mulkus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۖ thumma ilayhi turja`ūn

rows.arabic: وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ ٱشْمَأَزَّتْ قُلُوبُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۖ وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِذَا هُمْ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ
rows.translation: When Allah, the One and Only, is mentioned, the hearts of those who believe not in the Hereafter are filled with disgust and horror; but when (gods) other than He are mentioned, behold, they are filled with joy!
rows.transliteration: wa idhā dhukirallāhu waḥdahush-ma-azzat qulūbul ladhīna lā yu-minūna bil-ākhirah ۖ wa idhā dhukiral ladhīna min dūnihi idhā hum yastabshirūn

rows.arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهُمَّ فَاطِرَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ عَـٰلِمَ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ أَنتَ تَحْكُمُ بَيْنَ عِبَادِكَ فِى مَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
rows.translation: Say: "O Allah! Creator of the heavens and the earth! Knower of all that is hidden and open! it is Thou that wilt judge between Thy Servants in those matters about which they have differed."
rows.transliteration: qulillāhumma fāṭiras samāwāti wal-arḍi `ālimal ghaybi wash shahādati anta taḥkumu bayna `ibādika fī mā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūn

rows.arabic: وَلَوْ أَنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا وَمِثْلَهُۥ مَعَهُۥ لَٱفْتَدَوْا۟ بِهِۦ مِن سُوٓءِ ٱلْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ وَبَدَا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمْ يَكُونُوا۟ يَحْتَسِبُونَ
rows.translation: Even if the wrong-doers had all that there is on earth, and as much more, (in vain) would they offer it for ransom from the pain of the Penalty on the Day of Judgment: but something will confront them from Allah, which they could never have counted upon!
rows.transliteration: walaw anna lilladhīna ẓalamū mā fil-arḍi jamī`an wa mithlahu ma`ahu laftadaw bihi min sū-il `adhābi yawmal qiyāmah ۚ wabadā lahum minallāhi mā lam yakūnū yaḥtasibūn

rows.arabic: وَبَدَا لَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
rows.translation: For the evils of their Deeds will confront them, and they will be (completely) encircled by that which they used to mock at!
rows.transliteration: wabadā lahum sayyi-ātu mā kasabū waḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihi yastahzi-ūn

rows.arabic: فَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ ضُرٌّ دَعَانَا ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلْنَـٰهُ نِعْمَةً مِّنَّا قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أُوتِيتُهُۥ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍۭ ۚ بَلْ هِىَ فِتْنَةٌ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: Now, when trouble touches man, he cries to Us: But when We bestow a favour upon him as from Ourselves, he says, "This has been given to me because of a certain knowledge (I have)!" Nay, but this is but a trial, but most of them understand not!
rows.transliteration: fa-idhā massal-insāna ḍurrun da`ānā thumma idhā khawwalnāhu ni`matan minnā qāla innamā ūtītuhu `alā `il-m ۚ bal hiya fitnatun walākinna aktharahum lā ya`lamūn

rows.arabic: قَدْ قَالَهَا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَمَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
rows.translation: Thus did the (generations) before them say! But all that they did was of no profit to them.
rows.transliteration: qad qālahal ladhīna min qablihim famā aghnā `anhum mā kānū yaksibūn

rows.arabic: فَأَصَابَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مِنْ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ سَيُصِيبُهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَمَا هُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ
rows.translation: Nay, the evil results of their Deeds overtook them. And the wrong-doers of this (generation)- the evil results of their Deeds will soon overtake them (too), and they will never be able to frustrate (Our Plan)!
rows.transliteration: fa-aṣābahum sayyi-ātu mā kasabū ۚ wal ladhīna ẓalamū min hā-ulā-i sayuṣībuhum sayyi-ātu mā kasabū wa mā hum bimu`jizīn

rows.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبْسُطُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقْدِرُ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ
rows.translation: Know they not that Allah enlarges the provision or restricts it, for any He pleases? Verily, in this are Signs for those who believe!
rows.transliteration: awalam ya`lamū annallāha yabsuṭur rizqa liman yashā-u wayaqdir ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin liqawmiy yu-minūn

rows.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰعِبَادِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا۟ مِن رَّحْمَةِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَغْفِرُ ٱلذُّنُوبَ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
rows.translation: Say: "O my Servants who have transgressed against their souls! Despair not of the Mercy of Allah: for Allah forgives all sins: for He is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
rows.transliteration: qul yā`ibādiyal ladhīna asrafū `alā anfusihim lā taqnaṭū min raḥmatil lāh ۚ innallāha yaghfirudh dhunūba jamī`ā ۚ innahu huwal ghafūrur raḥīm

rows.arabic: وَأَنِيبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ وَأَسْلِمُوا۟ لَهُۥ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَكُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ
rows.translation: "Turn ye to our Lord (in repentance) and bow to His (Will), before the Penalty comes on you: after that ye shall not be helped.
rows.transliteration: wa-anībū ilā rabbikum wa-aslimū lahu min qabli an ya-tiyakumul `adhābu thumma lā tunṣarūn

rows.arabic: وَٱتَّبِعُوٓا۟ أَحْسَنَ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُم مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَكُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ بَغْتَةً وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ
rows.translation: "And follow the best of (the courses) revealed to you from your Lord, before the Penalty comes on you - of a sudden while ye perceive not!-
rows.transliteration: wattabi`ū aḥsana mā unzila ilaykum min rabbikum min qabli an ya-tiyakumul `adhābu baghtatan wa-antum lā tash`urūn

rows.arabic: أَن تَقُولَ نَفْسٌ يَـٰحَسْرَتَىٰ عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّطتُ فِى جَنۢبِ ٱللَّهِ وَإِن كُنتُ لَمِنَ ٱلسَّـٰخِرِينَ
rows.translation: "Lest the soul should (then) say: 'Ah! Woe is me!- In that I neglected (my duty) towards Allah, and was but among those who mocked!'-
rows.transliteration: an taqūla nafsun yāḥasratā `alā mā farraṭtu fī janbillāhi wa in kuntu laminas sākhirīn

rows.arabic: أَوْ تَقُولَ لَوْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
rows.translation: "Or (lest) it should say: 'If only Allah had guided me, I should certainly have been among the righteous!'-
rows.transliteration: aw taqūla law annallāha hadānī lakuntu minal muttaqīn

rows.arabic: أَوْ تَقُولَ حِينَ تَرَى ٱلْعَذَابَ لَوْ أَنَّ لِى كَرَّةً فَأَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
rows.translation: "Or (lest) it should say when it (actually) sees the penalty: 'If only I had another chance, I should certainly be among those who do good!'
rows.transliteration: aw taqūla ḥīna taral `adhāba law anna lī karratan fa-akūna minal muḥsinīn

rows.arabic: بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَتْكَ ءَايَـٰتِى فَكَذَّبْتَ بِهَا وَٱسْتَكْبَرْتَ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
rows.translation: "(The reply will be:) 'Nay, but there came to thee my Signs, and thou didst reject them: thou wast Haughty, and became one of those who reject faith!'"
rows.transliteration: balā qad jā-at ka āyātī fakadhhabta bihā wastakbarta wakunta minal kāfirīn

rows.arabic: وَيَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ تَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَبُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وُجُوهُهُم مُّسْوَدَّةٌ ۚ أَلَيْسَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًى لِّلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
rows.translation: On the Day of Judgment wilt thou see those who told lies against Allah;- their faces will be turned black; Is there not in Hell an abode for the Haughty?
rows.transliteration: wayawmal qiyāmati taral ladhīna kadhabū `alallāhi wujūhuhum muswaddah ۚ alaysa fī jahannama mathwan lil-mutakabbirīn

rows.arabic: وَيُنَجِّى ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ بِمَفَازَتِهِمْ لَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلسُّوٓءُ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
rows.translation: But Allah will deliver the righteous to their place of salvation: no evil shall touch them, nor shall they grieve.
rows.transliteration: wayunajjillāhul ladhīnat-taqaw bimafāzatihim lā yamassuhumus sū-u walā hum yaḥzanūn

rows.arabic: ٱللَّهُ خَـٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَكِيلٌ
rows.translation: Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is the Guardian and Disposer of all affairs.
rows.transliteration: allāhu khāliqu kulli shay-ī ۖ wahuwa `alā kulli shay-in wakīl

rows.arabic: لَّهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
rows.translation: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth: and those who reject the Signs of Allah,- it is they who will be in loss.
rows.transliteration: lahu maqālīdus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۗ wal ladhīna kafarū bi-āyātillāhi ulā-ika humul khāsirūn

rows.arabic: قُلْ أَفَغَيْرَ ٱللَّهِ تَأْمُرُوٓنِّىٓ أَعْبُدُ أَيُّهَا ٱلْجَـٰهِلُونَ
rows.translation: Say: "Is it some one other than Allah that ye order me to worship, O ye ignorant ones?"
rows.transliteration: qul afaghayrallāhi ta-murūnnī a`budu ayyuhal jāhilūn

rows.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْكَ وَإِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكَ لَئِنْ أَشْرَكْتَ لَيَحْبَطَنَّ عَمَلُكَ وَلَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ
rows.translation: But it has already been revealed to thee,- as it was to those before thee,- "If thou wert to join (gods with Allah), truly fruitless will be thy work (in life), and thou wilt surely be in the ranks of those who lose (all spiritual good)".
rows.transliteration: walaqad ūḥiya ilayka wa ilal ladhīna min qablika la-in ashrakta layaḥbaṭanna `amaluka walatakūnanna minal khāsirīn

rows.arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعْبُدْ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
rows.translation: Nay, but worship Allah, and be of those who give thanks.
rows.transliteration: balillāha fa`bud wakun minash shākirīn

rows.arabic: وَمَا قَدَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدْرِهِۦ وَٱلْأَرْضُ جَمِيعًا قَبْضَتُهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وَٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ مَطْوِيَّـٰتٌۢ بِيَمِينِهِۦ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
rows.translation: No just estimate have they made of Allah, such as is due to Him: On the Day of Judgment the whole of the earth will be but His handful, and the heavens will be rolled up in His right hand: Glory to Him! High is He above the Partners they attribute to Him!
rows.transliteration: wa mā qadarullāha ḥaqqa qadrihi wal-arḍu jamī`an qabḍatuhu yawmal qiyāmati was samāwātu maṭwiyyātun biyamīnih ۚ subḥānahu wata`ālā `ammā yushrikūn

rows.arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَصَعِقَ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ ثُمَّ نُفِخَ فِيهِ أُخْرَىٰ فَإِذَا هُمْ قِيَامٌ يَنظُرُونَ
rows.translation: The Trumpet will (just) be sounded, when all that are in the heavens and on earth will swoon, except such as it will please Allah (to exempt). Then will a second one be sounded, when, behold, they will be standing and looking on!
rows.transliteration: wanufikha fiṣ ṣūri faṣa`iqa man fis samāwāti wa man fil-arḍi illā man shā-allāh ۖ thumma nufikha fīhi ukhrā fa-idhā hum qiyāmun yanẓurūn

rows.arabic: وَأَشْرَقَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ بِنُورِ رَبِّهَا وَوُضِعَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ وَجِا۟ىٓءَ بِٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءِ وَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: And the Earth will shine with the Glory of its Lord: the Record (of Deeds) will be placed (open); the prophets and the witnesses will be brought forward and a just decision pronounced between them; and they will not be wronged (in the least).
rows.transliteration: wa-ashraqatil-arḍu binūri rabbihā wawuḍi`al kitābu wajī-a bin nabiyyīna wash shuhadā-i waquḍiya baynahum bil ḥaqqi wahum lā yuẓlamūn

rows.arabic: وَوُفِّيَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّا عَمِلَتْ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَفْعَلُونَ
rows.translation: And to every soul will be paid in full (the fruit) of its Deeds; and (Allah) knoweth best all that they do.
rows.transliteration: wawuffiyat kullu nafsin mā `amilat wahuwa a`lamu bimā yaf`alūn

rows.arabic: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ زُمَرًا ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا فُتِحَتْ أَبْوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ رُسُلٌ مِّنكُمْ يَتْلُونَ عَلَيْكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّكُمْ وَيُنذِرُونَكُمْ لِقَآءَ يَوْمِكُمْ هَـٰذَا ۚ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ وَلَـٰكِنْ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
rows.translation: The Unbelievers will be led to Hell in crowd: until, when they arrive, there, its gates will be opened. And its keepers will say, "Did not messengers come to you from among yourselves, rehearsing to you the Signs of your Lord, and warning you of the Meeting of This Day of yours?" The answer will be: "True: but the Decree of Punishment has been proved true against the Unbelievers!"
rows.transliteration: wasīqal ladhīna kafarū ilā jahannama zumarā ۖ ḥattā idhā jā-ūhā futiḥat abwābuhā waqāla lahum khazanatuhā alam ya-tikum rusulun minkum yatlūna `alaykum āyāti rabbikum wayundhirūnakum liqā-a yawmikum hādhā ۚ qālū balā walākin ḥaqqat kalimatul `adhābi `alal-kāfirīn

rows.arabic: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلُوٓا۟ أَبْوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ مَثْوَى ٱلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
rows.translation: (To them) will be said: "Enter ye the gates of Hell, to dwell therein: and evil is (this) Abode of the Arrogant!"
rows.transliteration: qīlad-khulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā ۖ fabi-sa mathwal mutakabbirīn

rows.arabic: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ رَبَّهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْجَنَّةِ زُمَرًا ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا وَفُتِحَتْ أَبْوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَا سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكُمْ طِبْتُمْ فَٱدْخُلُوهَا خَـٰلِدِينَ
rows.translation: And those who feared their Lord will be led to the Garden in crowds: until behold, they arrive there; its gates will be opened; and its keepers will say: "Peace be upon you! well have ye done! enter ye here, to dwell therein."
rows.transliteration: wasīqal ladhīnat-taqaw rabbahum ilal-jannati zumarā ۖ ḥattā idhā jā-ūhā wafutiḥat abwābuhā waqāla lahum khazanatuhā salāmun `alaykum ṭibtum fadkhulūhā khālidīn

rows.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى صَدَقَنَا وَعْدَهُۥ وَأَوْرَثَنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ نَتَبَوَّأُ مِنَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ حَيْثُ نَشَآءُ ۖ فَنِعْمَ أَجْرُ ٱلْعَـٰمِلِينَ
rows.translation: They will say: "Praise be to Allah, Who has truly fulfilled His Promise to us, and has given us (this) land in heritage: We can dwell in the Garden as we will: how excellent a reward for those who work (righteousness)!"
rows.transliteration: waqālul ḥamdu lillāhil ladhī ṣadaqanā wa`dahu wa-awrathanal-arḍa natabawwa-u minal jannati ḥaythu nashā-u ۖ fani`ma ajrul `āmilīn

rows.arabic: وَتَرَى ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ حَآفِّينَ مِنْ حَوْلِ ٱلْعَرْشِ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّهِمْ ۖ وَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَقِيلَ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
rows.translation: And thou wilt see the angels surrounding the Throne (Divine) on all sides, singing Glory and Praise to their Lord. The Decision between them (at Judgment) will be in (perfect) justice, and the cry (on all sides) will be, "Praise be to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds!"
rows.transliteration: wataral malā-ikata ḥāffīna min ḥawlil `arshi yusabbiḥūna biḥamdi rabbihim ۖ waquḍiya baynahum bil ḥaqqi waqīlal-ḥamdu lillāhi rabbil `ālamīn
